content: X-EMTSC MX Standoff clamp Metal cable/conduit standoff clamp with screw closing for use with collated nails ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Friction-fit in the nose of BX/GX/DX nailers for easy handling Virtually dust-free fastening Quick, cost-efficient fastening Applications Fastening cable conduits ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Conduits Material: Carbon steel For use with (tools): BX 3, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6, GX 120, GX 3 Technical Data | Application | Conduit Fastening | Material | Carbon steel | For use with (tools) | BX 3, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6, GX 120, GX 3 | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Steel | Approvals | N/A | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Material composition | Fixation element: Galvanized steel sheet, zinc coating 10-20 µm, Plastic component: Polyamide (halogen and silicone free) | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 228338 - Stand-off clamp X-EMTSC 1/2 MX - Package Size 100 pc - 228339 - Stand-off clamp X-EMTSC 3/4 MX - Package Size 100 pc - 228340 - Stand-off clamp X-EMTSC 1 MX - Package Size 100 pc
